pages.text: $(li)Deer can be found in $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/grass/flower_forest)Flower Forests$(/l) and rarely in other biomes of the Overworld.$(br)$(li)If you are close of one of them, it will try desperately run away from you.$(br)$(li)They may drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/leather)Leather$(/l) or Raw Venison upon death.
